entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
